text:
Simplified for #RandPaul:
Viruses mutate to survive—they replicate their RNA in a host’s cells. When the virus has enough mutations to represent a separate strain of the main virus, that version is called a V-A-R-I-A-N-T.
#SARSCoV2 
#WearAMask 
#COVID19 #variants #vaccine #Fauci https://t.co/mSqNStFxze
